Header: East Commander Meets District Secretary Polonnaruwa
Content: Major General Aruna Jayasekera, Commander Security Forces- East a few days ago had a courtesy call on the newly-appointed District Secretary (DS) for Polonnaruwa Mr. Panduka S.P Abeywardene at the District Secretariat Polonnaruwa and held cordial discussions with him possibilities of coordinating all social, cultural and religious assignments in a more effective manner for long-lasting peace and co-existence. Major General Jayasekera also insisted the need to have an effective communication among government authorities and Security Forces to accomplish the desired objectives. The Commander presented a memento to the DS and extended his wishes for his new appointment. Meanwhile, he called on Ven Kandaketiya Attadassi Thero of Galviharaya Polonnaruwa and received his blessings.
